# Read in data

```{r}
wine <- readr::read_csv("data/winequality-red.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

# EDA

Maybe create bins for fixed_acidity

```{r}
hist(wine$fixed_acidity)
```

```{r}
wine <- wine %>% 
  mutate(
    acidity_bin = case_when(
      fixed_acidity < 6 ~ "low",
      between(fixed_acidity, 6, 10) ~ "medium",
      TRUE ~ "high"
    )
  ) %>% 
  mutate(acidity_bin = fct_relevel(acidity_bin, "low", "medium", "high"))
```

```{r}
wine %>% 
  ggplot(aes(acidity_bin, quality)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + 
  theme_minimal()
```
